cells.source:
def sub():
    subject=['Americans','Indians']
    verb=['play','watch']
    object=['baseball','cricket']
    out=[(i+""+j+""+k+"")
    for i in subject 
    for j in verb
    for k in object]
    for combine in out:
        print(combine)

outputs.text:
Americansplaybaseball
Americansplaycricket
Americanswatchbaseball
Americanswatchcricket
Indiansplaybaseball
Indiansplaycricket
Indianswatchbaseball
Indianswatchcricket
outputs.name: stdout
